title: Fangtastic
description: Top Five Perks of Gina Covello's New Super-Secret Mission• The five-alarm-fire hotties. A few degrees below my genius boyfriend Bobby, of course.• The wannabe vamps love me. An entourage, finally!• Fashion tips from the steampunk crowd.• Putting a stop to the brutal killings—which only look like the work of vamps—in Tampa, Florida.• Finding out just what the Feds are hiding. . . Guantanamo Bay of the undead?
author: Lucienne Diver
